dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, uh, so I'm looking at this forecast from Kazhydromet, right? For Kazakhstan, March 25th to 27th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, uh, so I'm looking at this forecast from Kazhydromet, right? For Kazakhstan, March twenty fifth to twenty seventh.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet has released a weather forecast for Kazakhstan from March 25 to 27.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, what's, what's up? Are they, like, finally getting some spring weather?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, what's, what's up? Are they, like, finally getting some spring weather?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, absolutely not! This is wild. Eastern regions? Nighttime temperatures plummeting from like, minus ten to minus eighteen, down to minus thirteen to minus twenty-five Celsius. Minus twenty-five!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, absolutely not! This is wild. Eastern regions? Nighttime temperatures plummeting from like, minus ten to minus eighteen, down to minus thirteen to minus twenty-five Celsius. Minus twenty-five!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: East: Nighttime temperatures will plummet from -10 to -18ÂC to -13 to -25ÂC

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What?! Oh my gosh. That's, um, that's just extreme. And I saw something about ground blizzards too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What?! Oh my gosh. That's, um, that's just extreme. And I saw something about ground blizzards too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Ground blizzards are expected. And the daytime temps there are swinging from like, minus fifteen all the way up to ten degrees. How does that even work?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Ground blizzards are expected. And the daytime temps there are swinging from like, minus fifteen all the way up to ten degrees. How does that even work?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Eastern regions may also experience ground blizzards. ... East: ... daytime temperatures fluctuating between -15ÂC and 10ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's just a, uh, a massive temperature fluctuation in one day!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's just a, uh, a massive temperature fluctuation in one day!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! But then, get this, in the north and central regions, they're predicting dry weather. Dry!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! But then, get this, in the north and central regions, they're predicting dry weather. Dry!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While the northern and central regions will see dry weather

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Dry? Wait, so like, blizzards and minus twenty-five in the east, but dry somewhere else?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dry? Wait, so like, blizzards and minus twenty-five in the east, but dry somewhere else?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But then, the south, southeast, and, like, other parts of the east? Rain and snow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But then, the south, southeast, and, like, other parts of the east? Rain and snow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: rain and snow are expected in the south, southeast, and east

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, so just the full, uh, mixed bag then. Icy conditions, strong winds?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so just the full, uh, mixed bag then. Icy conditions, strong winds?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Icy conditions, strong winds, and, um, fog in some areas too, of course. Just to really round it out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Icy conditions, strong winds, and, um, fog in some areas too, of course. Just to really round it out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: rain and snow are expected in the south, southeast, and east, accompanied by icy conditions and strong winds. ... Fog is expected in some areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Fog! As if it wasn't complicated enough. It's like Kazakhstan's weather is just having a, uh, an identity crisis for three days straight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fog! As if it wasn't complicated enough. It's like Kazakhstan's weather is just having a, uh, an identity crisis for three days straight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no kidding. Seriously. Imagine trying to dress for that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no kidding. Seriously. Imagine trying to dress for that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You'd need, like, everything. From a heavy parka to, I don't know, a light jacket for the ten-degree swing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You'd need, like, everything. From a heavy parka to, I don't know, a light jacket for the ten-degree swing?
